am: Tony Blair 's former political secretary Sally Morgan - or Lady Sally Morgan , as she became in 2001- has been named today as the new chairman of Ofsted. Michael Gove , the education secretary, said she was a hugely taLen McCluskeyted individual whose passion is improving education and that she would ensure Ofsted "focuses on improving our schools so we can match the world's best" . is somewhat limited. Google is often called a one-trick pony, with its AdWords advertising platform continuing to generate most of the company's revenue. But as Eric Schmidt himself has said, it's quite a trick. If you've got a one-trick pony, you want the one we have, Eric Schmidt told target="_blank" Schmidt-Eric Schmidt-on-google%E2%80%99s-next-tricks/"> The Journal last summer.
